text: Jean-Marc NoÃ«l Aveline (born 26 December 1958) is a French Catholic prelate who has been the Archbishop of Marseille since 2019. He was an auxiliary bishop there from 2013 to 2019. Pope Francis made him a cardinal in 2022. Aveline been seen as papabile, meaning he is a possible candidate during the 2025 papal conclave. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Jean-Marc Aveline Catholic-Hierarchy.org Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Cardinals of the Roman Catholic Church Category:French Roman Catholic archbishops Category:French Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Marseille
title: Jean-Marc Aveline
